favourite.article: Oh!! It's just divine! Simply love the music. Thanks for putting such lovely collection of songs. God Bless you!!
The name is says it all.
This is a great hymn on Adoption.

This is true! just tell the father ABBA FATHER WE ADORE THEE! I know that many out there just can't tell how rich and abundant the Lord's word is. You want to say something... but nothing comes out... THE LORD'S WORD IS JUST TOO GREAT TO SAY IN THE VERY WORDS OF HUMANS BECAUSE THE WORD OF THE LORD IS FAR BEYOND TIME AND SPACE AND BEYOND VAST-REACHING... THE VERY LORD IS OUR STRENGTH... HE IS WHAT CARRIES US ON ! PRAISE THE LORD SAINTS!
I like this hymn because this hymn is all about God, and I like to sing praises to God.
This is a very inspirational site. You feel the presence of God moving while each hymn is being played. May God continue to bless and strengthen those who have compiled it. It is indeed a blessing.
Abba Abba Abba Father is our call when we worship our God the Father. We must sing to Him "ABBA, FATHER WE ADORE THEE". Make it habit to enjoy the meeting.
